alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 09 at 4:21PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 466 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES HERTFORD PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN EASTERN VIRGINIA MATHEWS NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GLOUCESTER ISLE OF WIGHT JAMES CITY YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, BAVON, BOWERS HILL, BUSCH GARDENS, CAPE CHARLES, CAPE COLONY, CENTERVILLE, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, CROAKER, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EWELL, EXMORE, FENTRESS, FIVE FORKS, FRANKLIN, GATESVILLE, GLOUCESTER POINT, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBRIER, GROVE, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORSESHOE, HUNTERDALE, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEW POINT, NEW POINT COMFORT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, PEARY, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, SMITHFIELD, SUFFOLK, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, WILLIAMSBURG, WINDSOR, AND YORKTOWN.
